definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The garbage collection pause times are the most significant delays any threads encounter.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾收集停頓時間是任何線程遇到的最顯著的延遲。

sentences.english: This function terminates the running process and all the associated threads.
sentences.chinese: 這個函數終止運行中的進程及其相關線程。

sentences.english: In situations where you know you need thread safety, use a thread-safe view.
sentences.chinese: 在需要線程安全的情況下，請使用線程安全視圖。

sentences.english: In situations where you know you need thread safety, use a thread-safe view.
sentences.chinese: 在需要線程安全的情況下，請使用線程安全視圖。

sentences.english: Since this is a flow diagram it will have a separate thread.
sentences.chinese: 由於這是一個流關係圖，所以它有獨立的線程。

sentences.english: By default, the new created is joinable.
sentences.chinese: 默認情況下，新創建的線程是可接合的。

sentences.english: The one time it is acceptable to swallow an interrupt is when you know the thread is about to exit.
sentences.chinese: 惟一可以生吞中斷的時候是您知道線程正要退出。

sentences.english: If the thread is available in the pool, it gets used.
sentences.chinese: 如果線程池中有可用的線程，它就會被使用。

sentences.english: If the thread is available in the pool, it gets used.
sentences.chinese: 如果線程池中有可用的線程，它就會被使用。

sentences.english: Fibonacci By MultiThread complete source code can be used directly.
sentences.chinese: 斐波納契通過多線程完整的源代碼可以直接使用。
編寫線程安全類是困難的。

sentences.english: Occurs on a pen thread when the cursor leaves the bounds of an element.
sentences.chinese: 當用戶將觸筆從數字化儀上提起時，在筆線程上發生。

sentences.english: It can be called iteratively in a server thread.
sentences.chinese: 在服務器線程中可以迭代地調用它。

sentences.english: Other threads need to wait until this threads releases the ressource again.
sentences.chinese: 其他線程需要等待該線程釋放資源再。

sentences.english: Other threads need to wait until this threads releases the ressource again.
sentences.chinese: 其他線程需要等待該線程釋放資源再。

sentences.english: There is also an additional global run queue where new threads are placed.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個附加的全局運行隊列，其中放的是新的線程。
